text: Wisdom teeth are out and I am surprisingly not in any pain! Did find out I CAN NOT take hydrocodine, it makes me sick and sleepy, but did find out being put under is weird and I repeat myself a lot when coming out of it! In love with Collin way more since he took care of me!

text: Still collapsed, but anti-inflammatories, hydrocodine, cooler temps, an air purifier where he sleeps, some silica gel dehumidifiers, and a 1.5 pound weight loss have given him days that only contain a small handful of coughs, if any. (Thank you for asking 💞)

text: Art Bell died from a mixture of prescription drugs. They were oxy’s hydrocodine, and benzodiazepines. It’s such dangerous thing to do, but the general public and doctors have NO idea how bad this is!
